snippet.title: Punch Line - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
PUNCH LINE, the thrilling Visual Novel Adventure game from the creators of the Zero Escape Trilogy, is coming to the west! Punch Line will be making its way to PlayStation 4, PlayStation Vita and Steam in Europe and North America in Summer, 2018.

Yūta Iridatsu is a pretty normal high school kid, with one exception: he faints if he sees girls’ panties. You never quite notice how frequent panty flashes can be until they ruin your day – he has to not look, or it’s lights out!
Order now!
https://amzn.to/2IgaJoi 
For more information visit: 
http://pqube.co.uk/games/

Come chat to us on our PQube Discord server! https://discord.gg/xHS7MnU
